content:
Sure, here are 20 quotes or affirmations with a polyvagal theme that are 25 characters or less:

1. Safe now.
2. I am enough.
3. Breathe deeply.
4. Trust yourself.
5. Feel the ground.
6. Calm and centered.
7. Find your voice.
8. Peace within.
9. Release tension.
10. Soothe your nerves.
11. I am present.
12. Heart open wide.
13. Choose compassion.
14. You are loved.
15. Self-care matters.
16. Connect with nature.
17. Embrace the moment.
18. Cultivate kindness.
19. Trust your instincts.
20. Be gentle with yourself.
